cases.output: The document is about Flex and Bison. Flex and Bison are tools for building programs that handle structured input, originally used for compilers.
retrieval_context: Flex and Bison are tools for building programs that handle structured input. They were originally tools for building compilers, but they have proven to be useful in many other areas. In this first chapter, we'll start by looking at a little (but not too much) of the theory behind them, and then we'll dive into some examples of their use.
